# ActivityPreviewViewKind.content

**Case**

The Live Activity presentation that appears on the Lock Screen and as a banner on devices that don’t support the Dynamic Island.

## Declaration

```swift
case content
```

## Live Activity preview types

- **ActivityPreviewViewKind.dynamicIsland(_:)**: The Live Activity presentation that appears in the Dynamic Island.
- **ActivityPreviewViewKind.DynamicIslandPreviewViewState**: Values that represent the different presentations of a Live Activity in the Dynamic Island for use in Xcode previews.
